column4: hi, i keep getting this problem as i try to mount my cd rom drive, unable to mount sr0 but the thing is i know the cd rom drive works b/c that is how i installed ubuntu 9.10 on the desktop
i also get no medium found on /dev/sr0
places -> computer: do u see the cdrom there?
run: "cat /etc/fstab | grep cdrom" and paste output
sorry i took so long had to plug in ethernet cord for the desktop which i am on now with the problem
this is what i got: /dev/scd0       /media/cdrom0   udf,iso9660 user,noauto,exec,utf8 0
this is what i got: timestamp too far in the future: Sep  1 01:09:58 2010
okay got the output but how do i post that output since it is larger than 10 lines
when i run grep cdrom nothing happens, i don't know why its like the terminal just stops
to use grep do: grep pattern filename
sorry i took so long i was trying to update bios but i can't get that either but i am in puppylinux now and posted the grep cdrom
sry i gotta go but someone will help i think
